Lines.Speech: OFFICIAL COMMUNICATIONS DOCUMENT FROM INTERGALACTIC HEADQUARTERS. _ATTEMPTS TO TAMPER WILL BE MET WITH SEVERE CONSEQUENCES...
...OF SPA MEMBERSHIP REMOVAL _AND REVOKED ACCESS TO ON-DEMAND INTERPLANETARY TV PROGRAMS.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Oh damn. Best not touch this file after viewing it.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: God forbid you don't get your weekly pedicure.

[Mission Report]
_Harvest Operation's team was in charge of extracting Mandaryan Crystals, invaluable resource capable of generating 100x more energy than our current fusion system. _We lost contact for 72hrs, possibly due to hostile activity. _Your orders (by priority) are the following...

1. _Rescue the living._
2. _Report the deceased._
3. _Retrieve the crystals._
Once you have finished, send us your location for immediate extraction. We expect unquestionable integrity in your reports. __Good luck Agent.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: 'Unquestionable Integrity'?! _From YOU? And they call ME the Artificial Intelligence.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech:
Newsflash!
_They're dead.
_Crystals gone.
__Can we go now?
